items: Company Annual Account and Ellipro Survey
comments: Utility bill issued by London City Utilities verified and valid until 2023-12-31.
Annual accounts data for 2022 verified with Ellipro score of 85.
Bank account and postal details verified, SWIFT code matches organizational details.
Address confirmed as 25 Bank Street, Canary Wharf, London, GB.
Regulatory compliance, including AML, verified through adherence to U.S. and global standards.
Business scope verified as extensive and global, with significant contributions to taxes and innovation.
PEP screening shows confirmed matches under investigation; detailed findings are unavailable.
Revenue for 2023 verified at $158.1 billion (net revenue) and $162.4 billion (managed revenue).
Market capitalization as of December 31, 2023 verified at $489,320 million.
